import './checkout.styles.scss' import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/cart.context' import './checkout.styles.scss' const Checkout = () => { const {cartItems, addItemToCart,removeItemFromCart} = useContext(CartContext) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map((cartItem) => { const {id, name, quantity} = cartItem return(

{name}

{quantity} removeItemFromCart(cartItem)}>decrement
addItemToCart(cartItem)}>increment
) }) }
Total: 0
) } export default Checkout
